item.title: 卡尼与弗里兰争夺最高职位，加拿大部长选择退出
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）接任加拿大总理一职的竞争越来越像是前财政部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）和前央行行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）之间的双向选择。【原文：The race to succeed Justin Trudeau as Canada’s prime minister is increasingly looking like a two-way battle between former Finance Minister Chrystia Freeland and ex-central banker Mark Carney.】

item.title: 对冲基金 SPX Capital 从低迷中反弹，击败巴西同行
item.description: 巴西对冲基金经理罗杰里奥-泽维尔（Rogerio Xavier）在首次出现年度亏损一年后，卷土重来。【原文：A year after posting his first ever annual loss, Brazilian hedge fund manager Rogerio Xavier pulled off a comeback.】

item.title: Venture Global引领美国能源IPO从二十年低点反弹
item.description: 在经历了 2003 年以来最糟糕的一年之后，能源行业将在美国首次公开募股市场卷土重来，大宗交易如雨后春笋般涌现。【原文：The energy industry is set to stage a comeback in the US initial public offerings market, with sizable deals springing up after the worst year since 2003.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与阿联酋商谈将铁路延伸至乌干达和南苏丹
item.description: 肯尼亚说，它正在与阿联酋商谈扩建一条通往乌干达和南苏丹的铁路线。【原文：Kenya said it is in talks with the UAE to expand a railway line to Uganda and South Sudan.】

item.title: 马萨诸塞州公布 80 亿美元公共交通资助计划
item.description: 马萨诸塞州官员正计划注资 80 亿美元，用于推进该州老化道路、桥梁和公共交通的改善项目。【原文：Massachusetts officials are planning to inject $8 billion into advancing improvement projects for the state’s aging roads, bridges and public transit.】

item.title: 殖民地公司关闭美国最大汽油管道调查泄漏事件
item.description: 殖民管道公司（Colonial Pipeline Co.【原文：Colonial Pipeline Co. shut the largest US fuel pipeline Tuesday to investigate a potential leak in Georgia.】

item.title: 爱尔兰时报》称爱尔兰主要政党达成政府协议
item.description: 据《爱尔兰时报》（Irish Times）报道，经过数周的谈判，爱尔兰的中间派政党达成了组建联合政府的协议，并得到了少数不结盟议员的支持。【原文：Ireland’s centrist political parties struck a deal to form a coalition government, backed by a handful of unaligned lawmakers, after weeks of negotiations, according to the Irish Times.】

item.title: ChatGPT 很快就能提醒您遛狗了
item.description:
OpenAI正致力于将聊天机器人打造成更具活力的数字助理，与亚马逊的Alexa等产品展开竞争。【原文：

OpenAI is working to turn the chatbot into a more dynamic digital assistant, competing with the likes of Amazon’s Alexa.

】

item.title: 文字实录欧洲美元的隐秘历史，第 1 部分：冷战起源
item.description:
市场的诞生。【原文：

The birth of a market.

】

item.title: 南非在创纪录降雨后关闭与博茨瓦纳的贸易航线
item.description: 暴雨导致洪水泛滥，南非暂停了与博茨瓦纳接壤的一个重要过境点的业务。【原文：South Africa suspended operations at a key border crossing with Botswana after heavy rains caused flooding.】

item.title: 摩根大通称 Altcoin-ETF 流入量可能高达 140 亿美元
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. analysts estimate that a proposed batch of exchange-traded funds holding alternative cryptocurrencies may attract inflows of as much as $14 billion should they get approved by the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 破旧的纽约公交枢纽在特朗普回国前获得 19 亿美元贷款
item.description: 就在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职典礼的前几天，纽约市破旧的公共汽车总站获得了一轮联邦资金，用于价值 100 亿美元的改造。【原文：New York City’s run-down bus terminal has scored a round of federal funding for its $10 billion makeover, just days before President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration.】

item.title: 埃及作为进口国重返冬季液化天然气市场
item.description: 埃及正在敲定本季度进口液化天然气的计划，在通过双边交易获得大部分需求之后，埃及发布的招标规模小于预期。【原文：Egypt is finalizing plans to import liquefied natural gas this quarter, issuing a smaller than expected tender after securing most of its needs through bilateral deals.】

item.title: 俄罗斯制裁推高油价，石油货运交易商囤积居奇
item.description: 由于拜登政府对俄罗斯的制裁继续推动超级油轮运价上涨，石油货运衍生品交易飙升至至少十年来的最高点。【原文：Oil-freight derivatives trading surged to the highest in at least a decade as the Biden administration’s sanctions on Russia continued to propel supertanker rates higher.】

item.title: OpenAI 任命贝莱德高管 Ogunlesi 为董事会成员
item.description:
这位亿万富翁拥有专注于基础设施投资的经验。【原文：

The billionaire has experience focusing on infrastructure investments. 

】

item.title: 图恩计划利用快速法案实现能源 "主导权
item.description: 参议院多数党领袖约翰-图恩（John Thune）表示，他计划利用共和党新任多数党正在制定的快速预算法案来扩大石油和天然气生产，实现美国的 "能源主导地位"。【原文：Senate Majority Leader John Thune said he plans to use a fast-track budget bill being crafted by the new Republican majority to expand oil and gas production and achieve US “energy dominance.”】

item.title: 英国城市大臣图利普-西迪克（Tulip Siddiq）在道德审查后辞职
item.description: 英国市政大臣图利普-西迪克（Tulip Siddiq）因被指控使用和收受与被推翻的孟加拉国政权有关的财产而接受道德审查，随后辞去了政府职务。【原文：The UK’s City minister Tulip Siddiq resigned from the government following an ethics review into allegations around her use and receipt of properties linked to the ousted Bangladeshi regime.】

item.title: 美国企业重复破产创 2020 年以来最快速度
item.description: 2023 年 10 月，派对城摆脱了 10 亿美元的债务，正如时任首席执行官布拉德-韦斯顿（Brad Weston）所说，"为推动长期增长奠定了良好的基础"。仅仅 14 个月后，它再次破产。【原文：Party City emerged from bankruptcy in October 2023, freed from $1 billion of debt and with “an excellent foundation in place to drive long-term growth,” as then-CEO Brad Weston put it. Just fourteen months later, it went broke again.】

item.title: Zetwerk 为 5 亿美元印度首次公开募股选择银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度制造和物流公司 Zetwerk Pvt 已为可能在孟买进行的首次公开募股挑选了银行，这次募股可能至少筹集 5 亿美元。【原文：Indian manufacturing and logistics firm Zetwerk Pvt has picked banks for a potential Mumbai initial public offering that could raise at least $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西班牙的购房 100% 税收计划可能难以在议会获得通过
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）提议对部分外国人的购房行为征收 100%的税款，但由于该国议会存在分歧，这一提议远不能确定能否生效。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez’s proposal to slap a 100% tax on some foreigners’ house purchases is far from certain to take effect given the divisiveness of the country’s parliament.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，Meta 计划裁减 5% 业绩最差的员工
item.description: 根据一份发给员工的内部备忘录，Meta Platforms 公司正计划裁减约 5%表现最差的员工，并打算在今年重新填补他们的职位。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. is planning to cut about 5% of its lowest performers with the intent of backfilling their roles this year, according to an internal memo sent to employees.】

item.title: 斯塔默不会卷入西班牙 100% 房屋税计划的争论中
item.description: 唐宁街坚称首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）与西班牙首相有着 "良好的关系"，此前佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）威胁要对欧盟以外买家的房屋销售征收100%的税。【原文：Downing Street insisted Prime Minister Keir Starmer has a “great relationship” with his Spanish counterpart, after Pedro Sanchez threatened to impose a 100% tax on sales of homes to buyers from outside the European Union.】

item.title: MSNBC 总裁拉希达-琼斯在分拆之前下台
item.description: MSNBC 总裁拉希达-琼斯（Rashida Jones）在执掌这家进步政治新闻网四年后于周二卸任，因为母公司康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp.【原文：MSNBC President Rashida Jones stepped down Tuesday after four years running the progressive political news network, as parent company Comcast Corp. prepares to spin off several of its cable-TV assets.】

item.title: 面临制裁风险，俄罗斯石油买家转向欧佩克+巨头
item.description: 官员们说，俄罗斯在亚洲的石油客户正在与该国在中东的欧佩克+石油输出国组织（OPEC+）同行接洽，以防美国的最新制裁造成供应缺口。【原文：Russia’s oil customers in Asia are approaching the country’s OPEC+ counterparts in the Middle East in case the latest US sanctions create a supply gap, officials said.】

item.title: 南非将工资待遇提高至 5%，工资协议前景更加乐观
item.description: 在政府将薪资提议从 4.7% 提高到 5%之后，南非公共部门工人对与政府达成薪资协议表示乐观。【原文：South African public sector workers voiced optimism of reaching a pay deal with the government after it improved the offer to 5% from 4.7%.】

item.title: 林德特（Lindt）销售强劲预示需求回升，可可价格上涨
item.description: 巧克力生产商Lindt & Spruengli AG公司公布了强劲的销售增长，表明尽管价格创下新高，但需求仍有弹性，可可期货随之上涨。【原文：Cocoa futures gained after chocolate maker Lindt & Spruengli AG reported strong sales’ growth, indicating that demand remained resilient despite record prices.】

item.title: 乌克兰债务主管布特萨就特朗普交易警告债券持有人
item.description: 乌克兰债务管理负责人告诫投资者，不要因唐纳德-特朗普下周重返白宫而寄希望于与俄罗斯的冲突能得到迅速而妥善的解决。【原文：Ukraine’s debt-management chief cautioned investors against betting on a quick and tidy resolution to the conflict with Russia based on Donald Trump’s return to the White House next week.】

item.title: 阿布扎比马斯达尔公司寻求美国收购以实现绿色电力目标
item.description: 阿布扎比主要的可再生能源公司在一年前收购了 Terra-Gen Power Holdings II LLC 50%的股份后，正寻求扩大其在美国的业务。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s main renewables energy company is looking to expand its business in the US after taking a 50% stake in Terra-Gen Power Holdings II LLC a year ago.】

item.title: 碧桂园因中国房地产市场下滑再创亏损纪录
item.description: 作为中国最大的开发商之一，碧桂园控股有限公司在拖欠债务后继续漫长的重组过程，2023 年再次创下亏损纪录。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. suffered another record loss in 2023 as one of China’s largest developers continues its lengthy restructuring process after defaulting on its debt.】

item.title: 阿布扎比风险投资公司投资加密技术初创企业 Dfns
item.description: 随着数字资产交易的升温，阿布扎比主权财富基金ADQ支持的风险投资公司Further Ventures牵头向总部位于巴黎的加密钱包技术公司Dfns投资了1600万美元。【原文：Further Ventures, the venture capital firm backed by Abu Dhabi’s sovereign wealth fund ADQ, led a $16 million investment in Paris-based crypto wallet technology firm Dfns, as digital-asset dealmaking heats up.】
